p: From the HIV keyword group, a total of 45 tweets were collected that were related to HIV status. These tweets included self-reporting of purported user HIV status, documenting othersâ€™ HIV status, and making disparaging/stigmatizing remarks about HIV status in the community. Misinformation was also detected; 25 tweets included incorrect and misleading statements about HIV risk and transmission. These messages included explicit statements mischaracterization the origin of the HIV outbreak.
